r.s: A PHP5 library for CAS Authentication.
r.d: This package is a PHP5 only library for identifying users in a JA-SIG CAS secured environment.
r.n: * Allow setting HTTP_Request2 object so configuration can be set. $server->getRequest()->setConfig('ssl_verify_peer', false); * Add $server->getRequest(), $server->setRequest(HTTP_Request2 $http_request) Change interface for server to abstract class.
